auth.title: Login
auth.enterPhone: Enter your phone number to continue
auth.enterCode: Enter the code sent to your phone

leaderboard.title: Where are the most volunteers?
leaderboard.addVolunteersDescription: Add more volunteers from your community and boost the ranking!

onboarding.selectProgramDescription: We are here to help bereaved families with whatever they need. We would love to get to know you better.
onboarding.selectSkillsDescription: Choose the skills you can help with
onboarding.selectCityDescription: Choose the city where you are located
onboarding.agreementWelcome: Welcome to the volunteer project! Please read carefully:
onboarding.agreementConfidentiality: Volunteers must maintain confidentiality about any personal or medical information of those receiving assistance, both during and after the volunteering period. Sharing or using this information for unrelated purposes is prohibited.
onboarding.agreementCommitment: Volunteers also commit to completing assigned tasks responsibly and following professional guidelines.
onboarding.agreementPrompt: Please check the box to confirm your understanding and start volunteering:
onboarding.agreementConfirm: I confirm that I have read and understood the agreement, and I will adhere to its terms.
onboarding.contactDetailsDescription: Please fill in your name and phone number .to start the volunteering process
onboarding.name: Name
onboarding.privacyConfirm: I confirm that I have read and agree to the
onboarding.addPictureDescription: Please add a profile picture so that people know :it's you
onboarding.thankYouDescription: We are currently in the process of building a stable community of volunteers. In the coming days, the project coordinator will call you to bring you on board.
onboarding.iAmWheelButton: I am a wheel - happy to help
